data.text: @WVGovernor Sweet Jesus can we drop this covid crap already! We all know you are getting rich from pharmaceutical company’s. Covid ended as soon as Russia invaded kinda weird isn’t it?

@WVGovernor Jim, do you ever think about how many deaths and damage you have caused for being a spineless sellout? You knew exactly what was happening from the get-go. You still push it but ignore geoengineering. Look at the unstable weather and the sick looking sky. You're a joke! https://t.co/pNYFku4Rjb
@WVGovernor Nope. Can't afford it.    gas prices
@WVGovernor It's been 2 fucking years since you sucked the schmeckle of pharma and the feds to ruin us. When the lockdowns and vax weren't necessary.
@WVGovernor Please talk to your doctor about a booster. I had two loved ones hospitalized days later after a booster. Again..talk to a doctor vs listen to a politician.

@WVGovernor You continue to push this fake jab. Even after Pfizer documents showed 1200 adverse effects. You are a disgrace to WV and you need to resign so an ACTUAL republican that supports parent choices can take over.
